General.Name: Blende Silver Corp
General.Description: Blende Silver Corp., an exploration stage junior mining company, engages in the identification, acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in the Yukon Territory. The company primarily explores for silver, lead, zinc, and copper deposits. Its flagship project is the 100% owned Blende property comprising 260 quartz mining claims covering an area of 5,346 ha located in the Mayo Mining District of the Yukon Territory. The company was formerly known as Blind Creek Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Blende Silver Corp. in December 2020. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 804 - 750 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T7
